<wd l="7435" t="5717" r="7560" b="5765" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="850" fontFace="Arial" fontFamily="roman" fontPitch="variable" spacing="18">=</wd>
<run italic="true" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="800" fontFace="Arial" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="18">

<run italic="true" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="800" fontFace="Arial" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="18">
<space/>
</run>
<wd l="8141" t="5650" r="8664" b="5832"><run italic="true" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="800" fontFace="Arial" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="18">
P</run>
<run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="850" fontFace="Arial" fontFamily="roman" fontPitch="variable" spacing="18">

<wd l="5554" t="5309" r="6115" b="5491">n(t)/N</wd>

n</run>

<ln l="5136" t="5520" r="6538" b="5702" baseLine="5658" forcedEOF="true">
<wd l="5136" t="5520" r="5458" b="5702"><run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="850" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="roman" fontPitch="variable" spacing="12">

/N</run>
</wd>
<run italic="true" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="900" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="12">
<space/>
<wd l="5525" t="5534" r="5640" b="5650">&lt;</wd>
</run>
<run italic="true" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="900" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="12">
<space/>
</run>
<wd l="5712" t="5530" r="6043" b="5702"><run italic="true" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="900" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="12">

</run>
<run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="850" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="roman" fontPitch="variable" spacing="12">
<space/>
</run>
<wd l="6326" t="5534" r="6538" b="5659"><run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="850" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="roman" fontPitch="variable" spacing="12">

<cell gridColFrom="3" gridColTill="3" gridRowFrom="1" gridRowTill="1" alignment="left" verticalAlignment="middle">
<leftBorder type="single" width="10"/>
<topBorder type="single" width="10"/>
<rightBorder type="single" width="10"/>
<bottomBorder type="single" width="10"/>
<para l="7814" t="5309" r="9418" b="5702" alignment="centered" lsp="single" language="en" styleRef="paraStyle_1_7_164">
<ln l="7814" t="5309" r="9418" b="5491" baseLine="5444" forcedEOF="true">
<wd l="7814" t="5309" r="9418" b="5491">ln(n(t)/N)/ln(1/N)</wd>
</ln>
<run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="850" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="roman" fontPitch="variable" spacing="20">
ln(</run>
<run italic="true" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="900" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="20">
n</run>
<run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="850" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="roman" fontPitch="variable" spacing="20">
(</run>
<run italic="true" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="900" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="20">
t</run>
<run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="850" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="roman" fontPitch="variable" spacing="20">
)</run>
<run italic="true" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="900" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="20">
/N</run>
